SEARCH
Package us.ullberg.startpunkt.rest

Class Theme

java.lang.Object
us.ullberg.startpunkt.rest.Theme
public class Theme extends Object
Represents the theme configuration for the application, including separate color schemes for light and dark modes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Theme()
    Default constructor for frameworks and serialization.
    Theme(ThemeColors light, ThemeColors dark)
    Constructs a Theme with specified light and dark color schemes.
